BBEX3.M.SVC.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in El Salvador / USD 1 = SVC ... (middle)
General: With effect from 1 January 2001, the US dollar was introduced as legal tender alongside the El Salvador colón at the rate of USD 1 = SVC 8.75.

Source: Since 2001: Banco Central de Reserva de El Salvador, San Salvador. 1991 - 2000: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Comment on 1992-06: Exchange rate as of 26 June 1992.
Comment on 1994-03: Exchange rate as of 25 March 1994.
